name: r7rpg.updatexp
command:
const { from } = IRC.message
const { getPlayer, savePlayer } = IRC.require('r7rpg.game')
player = getPlayer()

if (input != "confirm") {
  throw new Error(`{dc}${from}{/}: This command might fuck you. Use {y}~r7rpg.updatexp confirm{/} to continue..`)
}

if (from != 'barf') {
  throw new Error(`what bit of dont run it yet dont u understand`)
}

print(`{dc}${from}{/}: Resetting level`)

const oldLvl = player.stats.level

player.stats.level = 0
player.stats.next_level = 300

savePlayer(player)

sleep(1000)

print(`{dc}${from}{/}: Resetting stats`)

const removeHP = oldLvl * -10
IRC.require('r7rpg.player').addHealth(removeHP)

const removeStrength = oldLvl * -5
IRC.require('r7rpg.player').addStrength(removeStrength)

const removeDefense = oldLvl * -10
IRC.require('r7rpg.player').addDefense(removeStrength)

const removeAgility = oldLvl * -10
IRC.require('r7rpg.player').addAgility(removeAgility)

const removeIntelligence = oldLvl * -10
IRC.require('r7rpg.player').addIntelligence(removeIntelligence)

sleep(1000)

print(`{dc}${from}{/}: Leveling..`)

IRC.require('r7rpg.player').addXp(1, true)
